nodes.text: A concussive baton was a type of baton.

A concussive baton was a moderately sized baton that emitted a localized crack of sound when the concussive end was struck - compared to the bang of a slugthrower. The concussive force of the weapon was quite deadly, with strikes to the chin, ribs, and other vital areas being lethal, even against armored surfaces.
Concussive batons were the bounty hunter Mercurial Swift's signature weapon, who owned a pair that had concussive and electrical stun functions.
